attributes.action: Reintroduce Wolves to the United Kingdon
attributes.additional_details:
Official Petition, calling on the Government to reintroduce the Grey Wolf to the United Kingdom.

The Wolf is a native species to the United Kingdom and has been driven from this country by the misguided beliefs of our ancestors.

We the Undersigned wish that the Grey Wolf be reintroduced to the United Kingdom along with official protection status from her majesties government.
